mapper.update: update alg_r_user_org_invite set org_sn = #{orgSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_pend = #{isPend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_old_user = #{isOldUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where inv_sn = #{invSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select inv_sn, org_sn, usr_sn, user_email, is_pend, is_old_user from alg_r_user_org_invite
